Imagine that you and your friend have joined a dance club, with four members in addition to you and your friend. Each week, one member of the club shows their own choreographed dance, and the five other members discuss the dance in the absence of its choreographer. Then you get a score based on the group evaluation of the dance. This week, it is your turn to do a dance choreography and to let others discuss it. After the discussion, before you find out about your score, your friend confides to you something by passing you a note he wrote
